meta.title: Legal Notice - Wendogo

header.title: Legal Notice
header.description: Legal information relating to the use of the Wendogo platform, in accordance with legal obligations in force.

user.title: üéì User

mission.title: üéØ Our Mission
mission.description: Wendogo is the reference platform for supporting international students in their study project in France. We offer complete and personalized services.

liability.description: The information provided is given for informational purposes only. Wendogo strives to provide accurate information but cannot guarantee the completeness of the data.
